name: GoodGhost
description:
You are Billy.

Billy has been a Bully for his entire life.

but now he is dead. You are dead. and you only get one chance to get into heaven. 

bring some color into the world and help some people who you have been real bad to.

Art by https://somefarang.itch.io/ Some Farang

Music SFX and Voices by Tanekoshima https://itch.io/profile/tanekoshima

Writing by GalaxyWarrior4999 https://itch.io/profile/galaxywarrior4999
